ValidationRule.description: Users can not update the Type, Account,Booking Code
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Red_FCE_Code', NOT($User.B2b_Bypass_Validation_Rules__c), OR( AND( PRIORVALUE(B2b_Account__c) != NULL, PRIORVALUE(B2b_BookingCode__c) != NULL, OR( ISCHANGED(B2b_Account__c), ISCHANGED(B2b_BookingCode__c) ) ), AND( PRIORVALUE(B2b_Account__c) != NULL, PRIORVALUE(B2b_BookingCode__c) == NULL, ISCHANGED(B2b_Account__c) ), AND( PRIORVALUE(B2b_Account__c) == NULL, PRIORVALUE(B2b_BookingCode__c) != NULL, ISCHANGED(B2b_BookingCode__c) ), OR( ISCHANGED(Name), ISCHANGED(Corp_Type__c) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can't update the FCE Code, Booking Code,Account and the Type
